'''Deepwood Dweller's Perseverance''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Deepwood Dweller's Perseverance is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in an Aranara house in an underground cave in [[Ashavan Realm]]. The [[World Quest]] ''[[Legends of the Stone Lock]]'' is required to unlock the area leading to the chest.
